question: Indiaâ€™s first fulldome 3D Digital theatre inaugurated in which of the following cities?
explanation: India\'s first \'fulldome 3D Digital Theatre\' was inaugurated by Union Culture Minister Mahesh Sharma at the Science City in Kolkata, West Bengal. The new system is capable of screening high resolution, full dome, and digital 2D/3D content by utilising six, high-end projectors in a 23-meter diameter dome using Ulteria Seam technology. The Science City is operated by the National Council of Science Museums under the Ministry of Culture.
